author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Ex-FDA chief says U.S. likely won't have broad-based coronavirus testing until September
description: Ex-FDA chief says U.S. likely won't have broad-based coronavirus testing until September
content:
Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said Monday that the U.S. likely wont have broad-based testing for the coronavirus in place until September.
We're not going to be there. We're not going to be there in May, we're not going to be there in June, hopefull… [+6941 chars]
